original_text: Every year, Elkanah left his home in Ramah to go to the town of Shiloh. He went there to worship the Lord Almighty and to offer sacrifices to him. Hophni and Phinehas served the Lord at Shiloh as his priests. Eli was their father.
korean_text: 이 사람이 매년 자기 성읍에서 나와서 실로에 올라가서 만군의 여호와께 예배하며 제사를 드렸는데 엘리의 두 아들 홉니와 비느하스가 여호와의 제사장으로 거기에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: Every year, Elkanah left his home in Ramah
sentences.korean_translation: 매년 엘가나는 라마에 있는 그의 집을 떠났습니다

sentences.original_text: to go to the town of Shiloh
He went there to worship the Lord Almighty
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 전능하신 주님께 경배하러 그곳에 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and to offer sacrifices to him
Hophni and Phinehas served the Lord at Shiloh
